data.title: The World Of Null-A (Signed) by Van Vogt, A. E.: Very Good Mass Market Paperback (1964) Second Printing, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - Second Printing - Mass Market Paperback - Ace, New York - 1964 - Condition: Very Good - None - Ace no. F-295, reprint of Ace double no. D-31, vg in wraps, (see pictures), reading crease along spine. Signed by author, inscribed "One of our best , Lydia & A E Van Vogt" on title page. This and others are from my personnel collection. - The World Of Null-A (Signed)
data.text:
About this Item

Ace no. F-295, reprint of Ace double no. D-31, vg in wraps, (see pictures), reading crease along spine. Signed by author, inscribed "One of our best , Lydia & A E Van Vogt" on title page. This and others are from my personnel collection. Seller Inventory # 005546

Contact seller

Report this item

Science Fiction and Fantasy specialist. Also available are thousands of science fiction magazines from 1950's to 1980's (most not loaded yet into ABE). If you have any specific magazine wants or are looking for stories by a certain author, send me an e-mail. Most orders are shipped in a box, I pay insurance on all orders over $100.00.

Visit Seller's Storefront

Seller's business information

W. R. Slater - Books

OR, U.S.A.

Terms of Sale:

All books garanteed, 10 day return.

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
